name: Deep In Mind
description: Deep In Mind is a duo from Greece composing psychedelic chill out music with ethnic elements. Their sound consists of Synthesizers, found sound and various instruments.
They were formed in 2010 by Bjorn Alpha on electronics, music production and Marios Podaras, multi- instrumentalist with main focus on the Violin.
Since 2011 they have been releasing music with different labels as well as performing in Festivals and playing gigs in various types of events and spaces around Europe.

name: Impedance
description: The effective resistance of an electric circuit or component to alternating current, arising from the combined effects of ohmic resistance and reactance.
Free analog based musical improvisation.

Inspired by the philosophy and structure of analog electronic instruments, exploring pure, raw electronic sound musical paths since the summer of 2016. Nostalgic and melancholic melodies and drones agglomerated with the aggressive, percussive elements of a noisy industrial environment.

name: krats
description: In a world that wants us digital, binary and accurate, let us be analog, resistive and chaotic. Krats! Industrial noisy sonic attack by two ordinary losers.

name: ANFS
description: ANFS is the moniker of Athenian industrial/techno/experimental musician George Anifantis. He has been a staple of the darker corners of the scene since 2014, when his first EP came out on the Greek Modal Analysis. Over the past 4 years ANFS has made a handful of brilliant, banger EPs with equal degrees of Stygian depth and aggression. His creations are cathartic, usually building in intensity through clever, unobvious techniques of songcrafting, yet often they begin from a point of high intensity. ANFS is one of the masters of nasty-sounding, terrifying, downright evil tracks that have a lot of drive and keep you glued to the speakers. His latest solo release, Tzina’s House on Kafta, is a good example of just that, and so is his work with Sawf, which the duo release under Vofa (be sure to check out their killer PI05 EP, which came out just a month ago). ANFS is clearly a perfectionist and this approach has let him give the world some sick stuff

name: Anton Beatbox
description: Ο Anton Beatbox είναι ένας από τους πιο ιδιαίτερους selectors στην Ελλάδα, και όχι μόνο. Ξεχωρίζει για την ιδιαίτερη αισθητική που χαρακτηρίζει τα Set του - μία περιπλάνηση στον κόσμο της λιγότερο γνωστής ηλεκτρονικής σκηνής, μέσα από ambient, experimental, ritualistic techno και industrial ήχους.

name: KOSTADIS
description: KOSTADIS is the experimental solo project of Kostadis Michail. Spine-chilling soundscapes created by modular electronics, DIY junk contact mics, voices and ribbon devices. His multi-instrumentalism abilities have shredded via different bands like Lost Bodies, Wham Jah + Acid Baby Jesus

name: Last Days Of S.E.X.
description: Manos Chrisovergis (no danger no beauty, black spring, solar anus, ttwad/club fuck) rhythmic noise/technoise project from Athens since 2007 releasing albums in Hands Productions. Performed in festivals as Wave gottik treffen, Maschinenfest, Forms of Hands, Schlagstrom and in many countries across europe. His dj sets combine noise,industrial,lofi aesthetic expressed through a techno way.
For everything contact in mchrisov [at] hotmail.com or Fb message

name: Opiod Slot Machine
description: Opioid Slot Machine is a project founded in Thessaloniki,Greece on 2016 from Grigoris Kordellas and Iakovos Vogiatzoglou.
They had their first EP released on Drvg Cvltvre's imprint 'New York Haunted' along with a second one followed in 2018 on the same label.
After Iakovos moved to Copenhagen, Opioid Slot Machine became mostly a solo project from Grigoris.
Last year they desided to start their own record label called 'OSM tapes'. The two first releases came from NO/ON and Drvg Cvltvre with another three tapes coming up to see the light soon.
OSM have performed in some of the most important venues and festivals in Greece and also in cities like Berlin, Sofia, Zurich, Nicosia & Skopje.
From experimental to industrial techno, from ambient and noise to EBM and from slowburned tracks to uptempo they deliver some raw and unexpected energy to the dancefloor.

name: RO.1
description: Born in Athens , grown in Alexandroupolis-Samothraki and live nowadays in Heraklion Crete. Multicultured and musicultured , electronic sounds fav from techno to ambient and dnb to psytrance...Easy vibe feeling and dance addict.Proud member of BA 2037 crew based in Heraklion Crete.
Enjoy my sets and radio shows....have a nice trip
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCYsj0DNrhhc-37brYr4Qfyg

Member of BA 2037, based in Heraklion, Greece

name: Unified Method
description: Waves sweeping through an ever-changing sonic scenery . Glimpses of unity shown through the details.

name: V.V.I.A. (Venus Volcanism + In Atlas)
description: Venus Volcanism & In Atlas

Οι V.V.I.A είναι το μουσικό σχήμα της Ελληνίδας Venus Volcanism και της Δανής In Atlas. Συναντήθηκαν στην Αθήνα πριν από τρία χρόνια. Έκτοτε με τη μουσική τους σύμπραξη προσπαθούν να δημιουργήσουν ένα περιβάλλον στο οποίο εξερευνούν, αμφισβητούν και επαναπροσδιορίζουν έννοιες όπως ο έρωτας,το μίσος, η ύπαρξη, ο ανθρωπισμός μέσα από το πρίσμα lo-fi συνθέσεων. Η μουσική τους περιέχει στοιχεία όπως θέρεμιν, samples, συνθεσάιζερ και φωνητικά. Έχουν κυκλοφορήσει επίσημα το κομμάτι «Reconstruction», το οποίο συμπεριλαμβάνεται στο δεύτερο Phormix Tape «Light of Consiousness». Πρόσφατα κυκλοφόρησαν από τη META MOTO, τα κομμάτια «Psychopath» και «One Thousand Roles To Play». Τον Ιανουάριο του 2019 η Δανή σκηνοθέτης Frigge Fri έδωσε εικόνα στο «One Thousand Roles To Play» δημιουργώντας ένα μουσικό βίντεο-διαμαρτυρία ενάντια στους μηχανισμούς καταπίεσης και τα στερεότυπα του κοινωνικού φύλου(gender).

name: Ξέφρενο Αερόστατο
description: το μουσικό όχημα του Οδυσσέα Γραμματικάκη, ο οποίος ζει κι αναπνέει στο Ηράκλειο. Ήδη μετρά 13 χρόνια ύπαρξης αλλά και αέναου πειραματισμού, παντρεύοντας τους ήχους με την λογοτεχνία και την ποίηση.

name: Lycurgus
description: Coming from Thessaloniki, Greece, where he performed as a member of the improvisation collective “Fun With Nuns”, Lycurgus a.k.a. CXIxVI, “Goolyk” or “Sibilus Satanicus”, moved to Berlin in 2012 and later on participated as a resident live act at “OUR HOBBY IS DIFFERENT” parties, under the alias “Goolyk”.

Co-founder of “Templeyard Studios” collective that begun as a collaboration project with Miltiades, back in 2015, in Tempelhof, Berlin, they released their first short album, “Messages From A Better Destiny” in 2016. His latest vinyl release came in 2017.

name: TONTO
description: TONTO is a post-punk-noise, Electroacoustic-core, one man band (Zedde Francesco) from Jesi, Italy with lo-fi furious beats & unsignificant shouts.

name: Tacet Tacet Tacet
description: Audiovisual ambient experimental project, performed with electronics , alter ego of Zedde Francesco.

name: F:ousies
description: το προσωπικό μυστικό όπλο του Μάριου, ο οποίος διευθύνει το ανεξάρτητο label More Mars, παρέχοντας στέγη σε οποιαδήποτε μουσική η μή ιδιαιτερότητα κυκλοφορώντας cd,βιβλία,δίσκους και κασσέτες.

name: P.S. Stamps Back
description: ένα από τα πολλά μουσικά projects του Ιάσωνα Π. ο οποίος εκτός του οτι έχει βάλει τη προσωπική του σφραγίδα σε ουκ ολίγα ηλεκτρονικά σχήματα (Adaptories, And The Wind That Will Come To Blow The Dust Away, Cities In Desolation, Croatan Ensemble, Dom 108, Emissions Of Negativity, It Lies Within, Like Defeated Soldiers Of A Long Forgotten War, Millions Of Dead Tourists, Nihil Verum, Noisea, Rites Of Dissonance, The Factories Of Smirni, The Nylon Bug), διατηρεί από το 1993 το ανεξάρτητο label 1000+1 TiLt που έχει φιλοξενήσει 75 κυκλοφορίες από τον ευρύτερο χώρο της underground και πειραματικής ηλεκτρονικής μουσικής.

name: Molfetus
description: Το alter ego του Αλέξη Μ. (βλέπε Screw Operation) , που κινείται σε idm και techno μονοπάτια. Ο ίδιος περιγράφει την μουσική του ως ηλεκτρονικό έντεχνο / επιθετικό τέκνο.

name: Reaktiv.
description: Ο Reaktiv. είναι παραγωγός και dj από την Αθήνα και μέλος της ομάδας Love Techno Hate Greece.

name: Konops
description: Active since 2012 in Heraklion Crete, in various bars and festivals around Greece mainly promoting UK Bass, Dub and DnB selections.
Member of the BA 2037 music collective.

Has shared the stage or the booth with artists like: Dub Pistols, Dub Inc, BabaZula, Nouvelle Vague, Imam Baildi, Fleck, Anna Mystic, Hugo Kant, Poldoore, Jon Kennedy, mononome, Blue Square, ANFS, Insom, Professor Skank and many others.

Participated in festivals such as Resistance Festival (ATH), Secret Sound Festival (CHA), River Sessions (CHA), Maydays Festival (HER) and doing weekly and monthly mixes for Metro Radio (Her) and Home Radio (Chalkida) respectively.
For bookings and demos don't hesitate to contact me in: konopsmusic@gmail.com

name: Service Cost
description: Athenian based DJ & host of the weekly show Epiru Entertainment on Cannibal radio, Service Cost is also the driving force of an online podcast series called U-BAHN.
His collection varies through genres as well as his dj sets.

description: Love for the interesting side of the Electronics and enjoying sharing them with the community
